title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 61.6 - Professional study of dental hygiene
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 61.6 - Professional study of dental hygiene

State Regulations

To meet the professional education requirement, the
applicant shall present evidence of satisfactory completion of a program of
education for dental hygienists registered by the department or accredited by
an accrediting organization acceptable to the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
61.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
